name: Space drone (PSEMO)
description:
"WASD" or "Arrow keys" to move, 

"Right click" to "Left click" for dash,

"Q" to brighten up,

"E" to be invincible,

blades damage depends on it's speed.

(It looks wayy better on windows ^^)
